title: Coilhose Pneumatics 640S-DL In-Line Blow Gun with Safety Tip
features: Unique "full flow" straight through design will not restrict downstream air flow
1.4" in and out ports with 1/8" nozzle port
Chrome plated zinc body assures superior corrosion resistance and a long service life.
description: In-Line Blow Guns are a favorite of many users because of their small size, light weight and high flow rate. It's perfect for "at the tool" use because there is no need to remove the tool from the air line to use the blow gun.
details: {"Product Dimensions": "1 x 1 x 1 inches; 0.48 Ounces", "Item model number": "640S-DL", "Date First Available": "November 9, 2004", "Manufacturer": "Coilhose Pneumatics"}
